name: Thordata
tagline: Fuel AI training with high-quality, scaled data via proxies
description: As AI training and real-time applications accelerate, high-quality data has become a critical bottleneck in the age of artificial intelligence. Thordata provides residential, mobile, and data center proxy infrastructure for AI teams and data-driven businesses, enabling reliable global web data collection, responsible regional access, and smoothly scalable long-term data pipelines. From the very beginning, Thordata has focused on performance, stability, and compliance.

name: NBot
tagline: Personalized curators that surface what you care about
description: NBot reads the entire internet for you - news, niche blogs, social media, forums - then kills 99% of the noise and surfaces the 1% that actually matters. It restructures chaos into clean, actionable feeds and briefings so you save hours, stay ahead of emerging signals, and make faster, sharper decisions.

name: Clarity
tagline: Caffeine tracking to optimize your intake
description: Clarity began as a simple caffeine tracking app, it is now grown into a performance application that helps users use caffeine more strategically based on their specific optimisation. Clarity Intelligence uses the on-device AI to give tailored insights. The app get's better the more you use it!

name: Tubeletter
tagline: Turn Youtube vides into newsletters
description: Subscribe to newsletters from your favorite YouTubers‚Äîor create them for your own channel. AI turns videos into digestible summaries delivered straight to you or your subscribers' inbox.

name: Erla
tagline: Improve the way you master and understand languages
description: Erla is a language learning app with one mission: help you finally understand languages. Using the best AI models, we give you super short lessons for listening and reading. Listen to real-life scenarios you can actually use. Read short stories. Tap any sentence to see explanations, word meanings, and grammar breakdowns. Erla is designed to help you understand a new language fast‚Äîso you don't freeze when someone talks to you. 5-10 minute lessons. Real comprehension, not fake progress.

name: CrowdSynthetic
tagline: Predict crowd congestion before it happens
description: CrowdSynthetic is an open‚Äësource AI crowd safety simulator that predicts congestion before it becomes dangerous. It visualizes movement, generates real‚Äëtime heatmaps, scores zone‚Äëlevel risk, and triggers automated evacuation logic. Built for concerts, festivals, temples, and stadiums, it helps organizers understand crowd behavior and prevent disasters through simulation and analytics.

name: VocalLab.ai
tagline: Unlimited Free AI Voice Cloning with MP3 + SRT Exports
description: VocalLab.ai is an AI voice cloning and text-to-speech platform built specifically for TikTok, YouTube Shorts, and Reels creators. Clone voices for free, generate natural-sounding speech, and download MP3 + SRT subtitles in one click ‚Äî with no limits, no watermarks, and unlimited storage. Designed for fast workflows and short-form content.

name: Hundred Docs
tagline: Design docs with AI. Fill them via API
description: Design complex document templates with AI (chat ‚Üí template). Anyone can edit them visually, no code required. Developers only send data to the API to generate PDFs. Non-technical teams control layouts, and developers avoid heavy libraries and painful integrations.

name: LyftMyApp
tagline: Collaborative app testing and feedback for developers
description: A collaborative platform where developers get their apps and SaaS tested by other developers. Share your product, receive honest and actionable feedback, and help test others in return. Built for real collaboration, it enables faster validation, better UX, and higher-quality releases through peer-driven app testing and feedback.

name: Creator Finder Hub
tagline: Find creators by niche, metrics, and contact ‚Äî in one place
description: Finding the right creator shouldn‚Äôt take hours of manual research. CreatorFinderHub is a searchable influencer directory that helps founders, marketers, and agencies quickly discover creators across niches like Tech, Crypto, Finance, Fitness, Lifestyle, Gaming, and more. What you can do with CreatorFinderHub: üîç Browse creators by niche and category üìä View public metrics like followers üìà Discover trending creators üì¨ Access creator contact üß≠ Explore niche-specific pages

name: Talent Score
tagline: AI-powered resume analysis platform
description: Talent Score helps you optimize your resume with AI. Discover your ATS score, analyze your tech and soft skills, and boost your chances of landing your next job.

name: Lliben-Simple Screenshot Tool for Chrome
tagline: Capture full page, region, or element. Save PNG, JPG, PDF.
description: Lliben is a simple Chrome screenshot extension built for accuracy and consistency. Capture the visible area, full page, a selected region, or a specific element with pixel-perfect results. Designed from a real analyst‚Äôs workflow, it focuses on repeatable dimensions, clean output, and ease of use. No accounts, no cloud uploads ‚Äî everything runs locally. Save screenshots as PNG, JPG, PDF or print direclty.

name: GitStory
tagline: Your Github 2025 Cinematic Wrapped
description: Relive your coding journey with GitStory 2025. Transform your GitHub contributions into a stunning cinematic experience with beautiful animations and personalized insights. Your GitHub Wrapped for 2025!

name: GrowUp
tagline: Share Metrics, Find Investors, Discover Startups
description: Share your startup's financial metrics and make them accessible to investors. Let investors analyze startup metrics in real-time and make informed investment decisions.

name: DocBuilder
tagline: Build complete product specs by chatting with AI
description: Make your "Vibe Coding" smoother with solid specs. üöÄ DocBuilder is an AI partner that grills you on details to build comprehensive product specifications. Why? Because AI coding is only as good as your specs. DocBuilder interviews you thoroughly‚Äîfrom overview to screen flows‚Äîso you don't have to guess. Get a detailed Markdown spec ready to feed into Cursor/AI. Way better than raw ChatGPT!

name: Sera Protocol
tagline: FX multi-currency settlement protocol for 70+ stablecoins
description: Sera is a stablecoin-native FX settlement layer powering 70+ regulated, 1:1 fiat-backed stablecoins from 20+ countries. We enable on-chain FX rate setting, non-USD liquidity routing, and instant multi-currency settlement for real-world cross border payments, payroll, and global remittance. Try swapping across currencies, set your own FX rates across 552 currency pairs, and explore 50+ ecosystem ideas to build real-world stablecoin applications with Sera.

name: Co-finder
tagline: Find the right co-founder who actually wants to build.
description: The platform for founders to find their perfect technical co-founder, and developers to find exciting startup opportunities.

name: Likii
tagline: journal, diary, illustration, drawing, art, memory, moments
description: Likii is a delightful journaling app that turns your words into art. Simply write down the moments you love - a sunset, a cup of coffee, a smile - and the app creates unique hand-drawn illustrations in a warm, crayon-like style. Features: ‚Ä¢ Record moments you like with simple text ‚Ä¢ Generate beautiful illustrations automatically ‚Ä¢ Collect your memories in a personal gallery

name: 2025 Recap Maker
tagline: Recap your year with a short highlight video
description: 2025 Recap turns a year of photos and videos into a short, polished highlight video, automatically. - Select a collection of photos and videos from your year - Simplified media importer makes it easy to pick from each month of 2025 - Includes 2025-specific graphics, and sound design - Fine-tune each moment with an optional timeline, no editing required The result is a personal, shareable recap that‚Äôs effortless to make and fun to revisit.

name: Style My Space
tagline: Transform Your Living Spaces
description: Transform your living spaces with AI-powered interior design. Upload a photo and see your room reimagined in any style.
